entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:33 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 30 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
